title: Idea for Remakes
body:
Sick of afks and although remakes are good idea, I believe they should go one step further.

As compensation for the 10mins it often takes to get into a game and a further 3 mins before you can leave, how bout giving the lost LP from the afk divided by the remaining 9 players?  It would only be 2 LP at most but is still better than nothing

What do people think?

replies.body: ^ the system is fine as is
so you dont mind having to wait 10mins to get a game as adc only to have to remake and do it all again?

would you rather waste an hour on a 4v5 to lose roughly 20 lp?

give an inch, take a mile.
